description:
In this course titled ' Hypnosis- Enhance Your Creativity With Self Hypnosis .' By Pradeep Aggarwal you will learn powerful self hypnosis , visualizations and positive affirmations to enhance your creativity and innovative thinking in your daily and professional life.

You will also learn powerful techniques of self hypnosis to relax instantly and overcome depression , insomnia , negativity and stress using positive affirmations

This course is ideal for people who lack creativity and innovative thinking in their life and require it in their daily life.

This course is very useful for students , creative directors , people who are into marketing , business executives , young entrepreneurs and trainers .

This course contains more than 30 minutes of video content , bonus exercises and techniques designed over 8 lectures

This course contains -

Lecture1:Introduction

Lecture2:Remove Myths About Self Hypnosis

Lecture3:Conscious Mind Vs Subconscious Mind

Lecture4:How To Enter Into The State Of Self Hypnosis

Lecture5:How To Master Self Hypnosis To Reprogram Your Subconscious Mind

Lecture6:Guided Visualization Exercise : To Enhance Your Creativity

Lecture7:Summary

Lecture8:Bonus Exercise - Affirmations For Depression, Stress, Insomnia And Negativity

Lecture 9: Bonus Exercise - Affirmations To Enhance Your Creativity
title: Hypnosis- Enhance Your Creativity With Self Hypnosis
